text: Saint-Martin-des-Besaces is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Souleuvre-en-Bocage.Arrêté préfectoral 1 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Saint-Martin-des-Besaces
